docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Steps
docs.text:
1. Open the software.
  2. Select "New Project" from the menu.
  3. Choose a template and click "Create."

docs.title: Steps
docs.text:
1. Download the installer.
  2. Run the installer and follow the instructions.
  3. Verify the installation by typing software --version in the command line.
Requirement Minimum Version Python 3.8 Operating System Windows 11

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Welcome to the Software Guide! This documentation helps you understand how to use the software effectively.
